column4: Craig': Do you have anything on that partition? OS, data? You really should back up before shrinking.

you see i'm using this program and it one of the arguments has to be the drive you want the output to be stored at, i was hoping i can just direct the output to where i execute the command but no said i could.

http://pastie.org/2034553 -- you see the second argument requires a drive, i didn't really want to specify a drive (as i don't want it on a different drive etc), do you have any idea how i could do this?
